name: parser-combinators
description: A library of parser combinators, with which you can create your own parsers. The library will be continuously improved in time.

scripts.publishing:prepare: copy package.json dist && copy README.md dist
scripts.publishing:patch: npm version patch && npm run publishing:prepare
scripts.publishing:minor: npm version minor && npm run publishing:prepare
scripts.publishing:major: npm version major && npm run publishing:prepare
scripts.test: nyc -e '.ts' --r html -r lcov -r text npm run test:unit

author: Micha_i <isalski.michal@gmail.com> (https://github.com/michalusio)
